 88:     /**
 89:      * Ease Mail - sestaví a odešle.
 90:      *
 91:      * @param string $emailAddress  adresa
 92:      * @param string $mailSubject   předmět
 93:      * @param mixed  $emailContents tělo - libovolný mix textu a EaseObjektů
 94:      */
 95:     public function __construct($emailAddress, $mailSubject,
 96:                                 $emailContents = null)
 97:     {
 98:         if (defined('EASE_SMTP')) {
 99:             $this->parameters = (array) json_decode(constant('EASE_SMTP'));
100:         }
101: 
102:         if (is_array($emailAddress)) {
103:             $emailAddress = current($emailAddress).' <'.key($emailAddress).'>';
104:         }
105: 
106:         $this->setMailHeaders(
107:             [
108:                 'To' => $emailAddress,
109:                 'From' => $this->fromEmailAddress,
110:                 'Reply-To' => $this->fromEmailAddress,
111:                 'Subject' => $mailSubject,
112:                 'Content-Type' => 'text/plain; charset=utf-8',
113:                 'Content-Transfer-Encoding' => '8bit',
114:             ]
115:         );
116: 
117:         $this->mimer = new \Mail_mime($this->crLf);
118:         $this->mimer->_build_params['text_charset'] = 'UTF-8';
119:         $this->mimer->_build_params['html_charset'] = 'UTF-8';
120:         $this->mimer->_build_params['head_charset'] = 'UTF-8';
121: 
122:         parent::__construct();
123:         $this->setOutputFormat('mail');
124:         if (isset($emailContents)) {
125:             $this->addItem($emailContents);
126:         }
127:     }
128: 
129:     /**
130:      * Vrací obsah poštovní hlavičky.
131:      *
132:      * @param string $headername název hlavičky
133:      *
134:      * @return string
135:      */
136:     public function getMailHeader($headername)
137:     {
138:         if (isset($this->mailHeaders[$headername])) {
139:             return $this->mailHeaders[$headername];
140:         }
141:     }
142: 
143:     /**
144:      * Nastaví hlavičky mailu.
145:      *
146:      * @param mixed $mailHeaders asociativní pole hlaviček
147:      *
148:      * @return bool true pokud byly hlavičky nastaveny
149:      */
150:     public function setMailHeaders(array $mailHeaders)
151:     {
152:         if (is_array($this->mailHeaders)) {
153:             $this->mailHeaders = array_merge($this->mailHeaders, $mailHeaders);
154:         } else {
155:             $this->mailHeaders = $mailHeaders;
156:         }
157:         if (isset($this->mailHeaders['To'])) {
158:             $this->emailAddress = $this->mailHeaders['To'];
159:         }
160:         if (isset($this->mailHeaders['From'])) {
161:             $this->fromEmailAddress = $this->mailHeaders['From'];
162:         }
163:         if (isset($this->mailHeaders['Subject'])) {
164:             if (!strstr($this->mailHeaders['Subject'], '=?UTF-8?B?')) {
165:                 $this->emailSubject = $this->mailHeaders['Subject'];
166:                 $this->mailHeaders['Subject'] = '=?UTF-8?B?'.base64_encode($this->mailHeaders['Subject']).'?=';
167:             }
168:         }
169:         $this->finalized = false;
170: 
171:         return true;
172:     }
173: 
174:     /**
175:      * Přidá položku do těla mailu.
176:      *
177:      * @param mixed $item EaseObjekt nebo cokoliv s metodou draw();
178:      *
179:      * @return mixed ukazatel na vložený obsah
180:      */
181:     public function &addItem($item, $pageItemName = null)
182:     {
183:         $mailBody = '';
184:         if (is_object($item)) {
185:             if (is_object($this->htmlDocument)) {
186:                 $mailBody = $this->htmlBody->addItem($item, $pageItemName);
187:             } else {
188:                 $this->htmlDocument = new Html\HtmlTag(new Html\SimpleHeadTag(new Html\TitleTag($this->emailSubject)));
189:                 $this->htmlDocument->setOutputFormat($this->getOutputFormat());
190:                 $this->htmlBody = $this->htmlDocument->addItem(new Html\BodyTag('Mail',
191:                     $item));
192:                 $mailBody = $this->htmlDocument;
193:             }
194:         } else {
195:             $this->textBody .= $item;
196:             $this->mimer->setTXTBody($this->textBody);
197:         }
198: 
199:         return $mailBody;
200:     }
201: 
202:     /**
203:      * Připojí k mailu přílohu ze souboru.
204:      *
205:      * @param string $filename cesta/název souboru k přiložení
206:      * @param string $mimeType MIME typ přílohy
207:      */
208:     public function addFile($filename, $mimeType = 'text/plain')
209:     {
210:         $this->mimer->addAttachment($filename, $mimeType);
211:     }
212: 
213:     /**
214:      * Sestavení těla mailu.
215:      */
216:     public function finalize()
217:     {
218:         if (method_exists($this->htmlDocument, 'GetRendered')) {
219:             $this->htmlBodyRendered = $this->htmlDocument->getRendered();
220:         } else {
221:             $this->htmlBodyRendered = $this->htmlDocument;
222:         }
223:         $this->mimer->setHTMLBody($this->htmlBodyRendered);
224: 
225:         if (isset($this->fromEmailAddress)) {
226:             $this->setMailHeaders(['From' => $this->fromEmailAddress]);
227:         }
228: 
229:         $this->setMailHeaders(['Date' => date('r')]);
230:         $this->mailBody = $this->mimer->get();
231:         $this->mailHeadersDone = $this->mimer->headers($this->mailHeaders);
232:         $this->finalized = true;
233:     }
234: 
235:     /**
236:      * Mail vložený do stránky se nevykresluje.
237:      */
238:     public function draw()
239:     {
240:         return;
241:     }
242: 
243:     /**
244:      * Odešle mail.
245:      */
246:     public function send()
247:     {
248:         if (!$this->finalized) {
249:             $this->finalize();
250:         }
251: 
252:         $oMail = new \Mail();
253:         if (count($this->parameters)) {
254:             $this->mailer = $oMail->factory('smtp', $this->parameters);
255:         } else {
256:             $this->mailer = $oMail->factory('mail');
257:         }
258:         $this->sendResult = $this->mailer->send($this->emailAddress,
259:             $this->mailHeadersDone, $this->mailBody);
260:         if ($this->sendResult) {
261:             if ($this->notify) {
262:                 $this->addStatusMessage(sprintf(_('Zpráva %s byla odeslána na adresu %s'),
263:                         $this->emailSubject, $this->emailAddress), 'success');
264:             }
265:         } else {
266:             $this->addStatusMessage(sprintf(_('Zpráva %s, pro %s nebyla odeslána z důvodu %s'),
267:                     $this->emailSubject, $this->emailAddress,
268:                     $this->sendResult->message), 'warning');
269:         }
270: 
271:         return $this->sendResult;
272:     }
273: 
274:     /**
275:      * Nastaví návěští uživatelské notifikace.
276:      *
277:      * @param bool $notify požadovaný stav notifikace
278:      */
279:     public function setUserNotification($notify)
280:     {
281:         $this->notify = (bool) $notify;
282:     }
